mapper.insert: insert into t_car_info (car_name,car_picture_url,car_price,car_tag,brand_id,parameters_info) select #{carName},#{carPictureUrl},#{carPrice},#{carTag},#{brandId},#{parametersInfo} from dual where not exists (SELECT car_name FROM t_car_info WHERE car_name=#{carName} AND parameters_info = #{parametersInfo})
mapper.select: select c.car_name, c.car_tag, c.car_parameters_info, c.car_picture_url, c.car_price, b.brand_name, b.brand_logo_url from t_car_info c left join t_brand on c.brand_id = b.id
